price: Pa im je Allah dao nagradu na ovome i ljepotu nagrade na onome svijetu, a Allah voli dobročinitelje.
arabic: فَـَٔاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ثَوَابَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَحُسۡنَ ثَوَابِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faātāhumu al-lahu thawāba al-dun'yā waḥus'na thawābi al-ākhirati wal-lahu yuḥibbu al-muḥ'sinīna
